description.value: You have learned magical knowledge from a wide spectrum of disciplines. Choose two cantrips or 1st level spells from any class spell list, including bard spells. The spells can be from different classes. The chosen spells count as bard spells for you, and they count as extra known spells, meaning they don't count against the number of spells you know.You can exchange a spell learned from Magical Secrets when you level up, like with other spells.
